symptoms.text: yellow to reddish coloured spider-like insects that cause the leaf to turn reddish brown and bronzy
Wadudu wanaofanana na buibui wenye rangi ya njano au nyekundu ambao husababisha jani kugeuka nyekundu au shaba

response.text: It is likely that your potatoes may be affected by Mites. To control Mites, use either Avirmec - 10mls/20L, Levo - 20mls/20L or Nissorun – 10mls/20L as per instructions on the label. Please contact your agrovet for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop vyako vimeathiriwa na wadudu wa Mites. Kudhibiti wadudu wa Mites, tumia Avirmec - 10mls/20L, Levo - 20mls/20L or Nissorun – 10mls/20L kulingana na ushauri katika lebo. Tafadhali wasiliana na duka la dawa na pembejeo za kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi

confirmation.text: Do you see on the leaves, silken webbing on the underside?
Je, unaona kwenye jani, kuwepo kwa dalili ya mtandao kwenye pande ya chini?

symptoms.text: black or brown lesions on leaves
vidonda vyeusi au kahawia kwenye majani

diagnosis: To prevent late blight farmers should stick the plant and rotate potatoes with other plants from a different family.
treatment: To control late blight, you can spray with copper-based fungicides such as Metalaxyl and Mancozeb according to product label.

response.text: It is likely that your potatoes may be affected by late blight. To control late blight, use either Victory - 50g/20L, Sphinx - 40g/20L, Amimax – 40g/20L or Metacop – 40g/20L as per instructions on the label. Please contact your agrovet for further clarification.

Inawezekana kwamba $crop yako yameathiriwa na ugonjwa wa late blight. Ili kudhibiti ugonjwa huu, tumia Victory - 50g/20L, Sphinx - 40g/20L, Amimax – 40g/20L or Metacop – 40g/20L kulingana na ushauri katika lebo. Tafadhali wasiliana na duka la dawa na pembejeo za kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi

confirmation.text: Do you see whitish spots on the underside of the leaves that look like flour?
Je,unaona madoadoa nyeupe kwenye upande wa chini wa jani inayoonekana kama unga?

response.text: This is the final fortnight of using Super Nitro Humix (3L/Ha) for foliars. We recommend applying Galil (0.25L/Ha) or Levo (0.5L/Ha) to control insects and either Funguran (2.5kg/Ha), Victory (2.5kg/Ha) or *Metacop, all of which are 12-spray fungicides. Prominent (4L/Ha) should be used as a biostimulant at this stage
Hakikisha shamba lako limeandaliwa vizuri kwa kuvunja chembe kubwa za udongo. Hii itahakikisha ubora na usawa wa uchipukizi wa mimea.

symptoms.text: leaf curling and stunted growth of the leaflets caused by small pear-shaped organisms
jani kukunjana na kuonesha dalili ya kukauka na kutokua inayosababishwa na wadudu wadogo wadogo

response.text: It is likely that your potatoes may be affected by Aphids. To control Aphids, use either Golan - 5g/20L, Levo - 20mls/20L, Aster Extrim – 10mls/20L, Lambdex – 12mls/20L or Buffalo – 10mls/20L as per instructions on the label. Please contact your agrovet for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop vyako vimeathiriwa na wadudu wa Aphids. Kudhibiti wadudu wa Aphids, tumia Golan - 5g/20L, Levo - 20mls/20L, Aster Extrim – 10mls/20L, Lambdex – 12mls/20L or Buffalo – 10mls/20L kulingana na ushauri katika lebo. Tafadhali wasiliana na duka la dawa na pembejeo za kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi

Je, unaona kwenye jani, kuwepo kwa dalili ya kuoza yenye majivu?

symptoms.text: white or yellow lavae(worm) with a brown head
kiwavi nyeupe au njano yenye kichwa ya kahawia

response.text: It is likely that your potatoes may be affected by potato tuber moth. To control potato tuber moth, use either Root cap - 2g/hole, Indox - 10mls/20L or Buffalo – 10g/20L as per instructions on the label. Please contact your agrovet for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop vyako vimeathiriwa na ugonjwa wa potato tuber moth. Kudhibiti ugonjwa wa potato tuber moth, tumia Root cap - 2g/hole, Indox - 10mls/20L or Buffalo – 10g/20L kulingana na ushauri katika lebo. Tafadhali wasiliana na duka la dawa na pembejeo za kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi

response.text: From the eight to end of 9th week, we recommend using Polyfeed 19:19:19 (4kg/Ha) for foliars, Prove (0.5L/Ha) or Radiant (0.25L/Ha) for insect control Amimax (2kg/Ha) for fungicide and Prominent (4L/Ha) as a biostimulant.
Kwa mazao bora, chagua viazi wa ukubwa wa yai na ngozi za laini, macho mengi ambayo hayaja / majeraha. Mbegu mbaya huleta mazao duni.

Apply 2 - 3L/Ha of Linagan after final ridging before emergence of potatoes and Super Nitro Humix for foliars at 3L/Ha. At this stage Aster Extrim (0.25L/Ha), Lambdex (0.35L/Ha) or *Rapid are effective insecticides to use. Use of fungicides such as Funguran or Emthane both at quantities of 2.5kg/Ha is recommended.
Kwa uchipuko nzuri na mazao mazuri, viazi huhitaji udongo wa mchanga wa mchanga ambayo hayana mawe, milima ya siafu na mbali na miti kubwa.

From the second to sixth weeks of cropping, Super Nitro Humix (3L/Ha) is to be used for foliars. You have a choice of Nissorun (0.5L/Ha), Avirmec 0.5L/Ha or Cyrux (0.25L/Ha - 6 sprays) to use for insecticide. You can apply Amimax (2kg/Ha) or Bigo (0.75L/Ha) for fungicides.
Sehemu ya mazao ya viazi inakaa katika udongo kwa hivyo inahitajika kupalilia baada ya kuchomoza mbili ili pawepo na unyevu wa kutosha na kufunika viazi kutokana na mwanga wa jua

doa au madoadoa ya rangi ya kahawia kwenye majani na majani kugeuka rangi ya njano

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop vyako vimeathiriwa na ugonjwa wa early blight. response.text: From week 10 to end of 11th, we recommend using Multi K(4kg/Ha) for foliar, Nissorun or Avirmec both at 0.5L/Ha for insecticide, Othello (0.5kg/Ha) as a 12-spray fungicide and Tivag (0.25L/Ha) as a biostimulant.
Tumia viazi mzima wakati wa kupanda. Mazao yakikatwa wazi huweza kupata maambukizi ya bakteria na kusababisha mavuno duni.

treatment: To control practice crop rotation with crops from different families, do mixed cropping and maintain high organic matter in the field. Continuous tillage helps expose the pest to the surface hence killing it as a result of the effect of the heat from the sun.

response.text: It is likely that your potatoes may be affected by root-knot nematode. To control nematodes, drench the soil Neemraj 80ml/20L and apply Rootcap 2g per hole. Please contact your agrovet for further clarification.

kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop yako inaweza kuathiriwa na wadudu wa root-knot nematode. Ili kudhibiti wadudu hawa, loweka Neemraj 80ml/20L na uweke Rootcap 2g kwa kila shimo. Tafadhali wasiliana na duka la dawa na pembejeo za kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi

mizizi kufura na kuwepo kwa galls, shanga au mafundo

response.text: Use Multi K(4kg/Ha) for foliar, Radiant (0.25L/Ha) or Levo (0.5L/Ha) to control insects and Amimax for fungicide from the 12th week to end of 13th week of your potato crops.
Wakati wa maandalizi ya mfuo, wacha nafasi ya kati ya mifuo ya 70-75cm. Wakati wa kupanda, weka mizizi kwa kina cha 15cm na 30-35cm mbali.

tags: wiki ya kumi na mbili na kumi na tatu

response.text: Apply Panga which is a non-selective herbicide for land preparation. You will also need to use Agromaster 16:10:22+DAP which is a basal fertilizer at quantities of 200kgs + 50kgs/Acre. For foliars, use Polyfeed 19:19:19 at 4kg/Ha. You have a choice of either Rootcap or Neemraj as insecticides which are applied 2g/plant or 2.5L/Ha respectively. To protect your crop against fungal diseases, you can use either Goldazim at 1L/Ha or Trianum 2.5kg/Ha. Finally, use Tivag as a biostimulant to break seed dormancy.
Upimaji wa udongo ni muhimu kama itakusaidia kujua aina na kiasi cha mbolea cha kutumia ili kuhakikisha uzalishaji wa viazi ulioimarishwa.

week.sw: wiki ya kumi na nne na kumi na tano

response.text: From the 14th week onwards, we recommend Growcal Mgb (2L/Ha) for foliar. For insecticides, use Prove (0.5L/Ha) or Galil (0.25L/Ha) which are both 6-spray and apply Othello (0.5kg/Ha - 12 spray) to control fungal activity
Ili kurasihisha shughuli ya kupima nafasi wakati wa kupanda, kukata vijiti kwa urefu wa 30-35cm au tumia kamba yenye alama inayoonyesha mahali ambapo mbugu inapaswa kuwekwa.

response.text: Week 16 is fairly close to the end of the farming cycle so you only need Growcal Mgb (2L/Ha) foliar and biostimuland Tivag (0.25L/Ha ).
Kupunguza kutokea kwa wadudu na magonjwa waharibifu; baada ya kuvuna viazi, unaweza kupanda karoti, kabichi au mahindi kwa misimu miwili kabla ya kupanda viazi tena.

symptoms.text: holes in the leaves of seedlings
mahindi ndogo imekulwa na wadudu weusi wa kukata mti wa mahindi na pia kutoboa mashimo kwa majani

diagnosis: To prevent cutworms, farmers should plough the field just before planting maize. Ploughing exposes the cutworms to predators and the sun, which kills the cutworms
treatment: To control cutworms farmers can spray Lambda-cyhalothrin, deltamethrin or cypermethrin. Use certified seed which has been dressed to protect your crops.

response.text:
It is likely that your maize may be affected by cutworms. To control cutworms farmers can spray Lambda-cyhalothrin, deltamethrin or cypermethrin. Use certified seed which has been dressed to protect your crops.and To prevent cutworms, farmers should plough the field just before planting maize. Ploughing exposes the cutworms to predators and the sun, which kills the cutworms
. Please contact your nearest agricultural extension officer for further clarification.

Inawezekana kwamba mazao yako ya $crop yanaweza kuathiriwa na cutworms. Ili kudhibiti cutworms wakulima wanaweza kumwaga Lambda-cyhalothrin, deltamethrin au cypermethrin. Tumia mbegu zilizohakikishiwa ambazo zimevaa kulinda mazao yako. Na kuzuia vidudu, wakulima wanapaswa kulima shamba kabla ya kupanda mahindi. Kupanda huwaonyesha wanyama wadogo na jua, ambayo huua vidonda vya nusu. Tafadhali wasiliana na afisa wako wa ugani wa kilimo kwa ajili ya ufafanuzi zaidi.

diagnosis: To prevent fusarium ear rot, use tolerant varieties such as C637. Do not eat harvested maize with fusarium ear rot because of aflatoxin risk or feed it to your animals.

response.text: It is likely that your maize may be affected by fusarium ear rot. To prevent fusarium ear rot, use tolerant varieties such as C637. Do not eat harvested maize with fusarium ear rot because of aflatoxin risk or feed it to your animals. Please contact your nearest agricultural extension officer for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop yako yameathiriwa na ugonjwa wa kuoza kwa mahindi (fusarium ear rot). Kuzuia ugonjwa huu, tumia aina ya mbegu iliyo sugu kwa ugonjwa huu kama vile C637. Mahindi iliyovunwa kama yameathiriwa na ugonjwa huu wa kuoza hayapaswi kulishwa wanyama au kukulwa na binadamu kwa sababu ya hatari ya sumu ya aflatoxin. Tafadhali wasiliana na afisa wako wa kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi.

diagnosis: The plant is infested with stalk borer.To control stalk borer, apply one teaspoon of ash or dry sandy soil into the leaf opening at the top of young maize plants. Farmers can also apply deltamethrin-based products according to product label, as soon as you see signs of stalk borers. For severe infestation, burn crop residues to protect next season rsquo;s crop.
treatment: To control stalk borer, apply one teaspoon of ash or dry sandy soil into the leaf opening at the top of young maize plants. Farmers can also apply deltamethrin-based products according to product label, as soon as you see signs of stalk borers. Farmers can also apply deltamethrin-based products according to product label, as soon as you see signs of stalk borers. For severe infestation, burn crop residues to protect next season's crop.Please contact your nearest agricultural extension officer for further clarification.

treatment: To control shell and dry maize until it is very dry. The maize must be so dry that when you bite it, it is hard to break.Use Admix Pirimiphos-methyl + Permethrin (Actellic Super) or Fenitrothion 50g/L + Deltamethrin 5g/L (Shumba Super), dust formulations insecticides, at 25g/50kg dried maize on a mat or tarpaulin using a shovel/plate and store treated grain in polypropylene or in storage structures

response.text: It is likely that your maize may be affected by large grain borer. To control shell and dry maize until it is very dry. The maize must be so dry that when you bite it, it is hard to break.Use Admix Pirimiphos-methyl + Permethrin (Actellic Super) or Fenitrothion 50g/L + Deltamethrin 5g/L (Shumba Super), dust formulations insecticides, at 25g/50kg dried maize on a mat or tarpaulin using a shovel/plate and store treated grain in polypropylene or in storage structuresand. Please contact your nearest agricultural extension officer for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop yako yameathiriwa na wadudu wa kutoboa mbegu (large grain borer). Kudhibiti wadudu hawa,anika mahindi mpaka yakauka kabisa. Mahindi lazima ikauke kabisa hadi ikuwe vigumu kuvunja kwa kuuma. Pia unaweza tumia dawa ya Admix Pirimiphos-methyl Permethrin (Actellic Super) au Fenitrothion 50g/L Deltamethrin 5g/L (Shumba Super), vumbi mchanganyiko wa dawa ya kuua wadudu, kwa kipimo cha 25g / 50kg kwa mahindi kisha kukausha.Hifadhi mahindi baada ya kutibiwa na katika dawa ya polypropen. Tafadhali wasiliana na afisa wako wa kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi.

symptoms.text: large holes on seeds caused by black insects,maize attacked while still in the field,increased powder inside cob enclosure
mashimo makubwa kwenye mbegu inayoletwa na wadudu weusi,mahindi kushambuliwa ikiwa bado kwa shamba,kuwepo na unga unga katika mfuko wa mahindi

confirmation.text: do you see presence of increased grain powder?

neighbour.question_en: Did you notice the insects while harvesting from the farm or right after storage?
neighbour.question_sw: Je, mahindi iliathiriwa ipo shambani ama tayari yameshavunwa?

treatment: You can apply manure with low carbon to nitrogen ratios to reduce the incidence of this disease. Seed treatment with bacterial extracts of Bacillus megaterium could also decrease the incidence of the disease.

response.text: It is likely that your maize may be affected by common smut. You can apply manure with low carbon to nitrogen ratios to reduce the incidence of this disease. Seed treatment with bacterial extracts of Bacillus megaterium could also decrease the incidence of the disease.and. Please contact your nearest agricultural extension officer for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop yako inaweza kuathiriwa na army worm. Unaweza kutumia mbolea na kaboni chini kwa uwiano wa nitrojeni kupunguza matukio ya ugonjwa huu. Matibabu ya mbegu na extracts bakteria ya Bacillus megaterium inaweza pia kupunguza matukio ya disease.and ya. Tafadhali wasiliana na afisa ugani wa kilimo yako karibu kwa ajili ya ufafanuzi zaidi.

symptoms.text: during flowering maize cob opens up and has growth with black powder on upper part of cob
mahindi wakati wakutoa mazao mfuko wa kufunika mahindi kufunguka na kupata ugonjwa ambao unafanya mahindi kukuwa na unga unga nyeusi kweye pande ya juu ya mahindi

confirmation.text: Is there growth that has black powder inside?
Je, kwenye mbegu zilizomea kwa hali isiyo ya kawaida kunayo unga au vumbi nyeusi?

neighbour.question_en: Which of these do you see, growth on the maize cob or signs of rotting?
neighbour.question_sw: Je, kwenye mahindi iliyoathiriwa, unaona  ipi kati ya dalili ya kuoza au mbegu kumea hali isiyo ya kawaida?

treatment: To control  apply the beneficial nematodes in the late afternoon, and water the lawn immediately after applying them because beneficial nematodes need to invade the bodies of grubs in order to propagate, you must choose between using this method or using a chemical pesticide.

response.text: It is likely that your maize may be affected by white grubs. To control apply the beneficial nematodes in the late afternoon, and water the lawn immediately after applying them because beneficial nematodes need to invade the bodies of grubs in order to propagate, you must choose between using this method or using a chemical pesticide.and. Please contact your nearest agricultural extension officer for further clarification.

kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop yako inaweza kuathiriwa na wadudu weupe wa mchanga (buu nyeupe/White grubs). Ili kudhibiti wadudu hawa,unaweza tumia wadudu wengine manufaa na kuziweka katika shamba mchana kisha kunyunyizia shamba maji mara moja ili kusaidia wadudu manufaa kuvamia miili ya grubs ili kueneza, unaweza chagua kati ya kutumia mbinu hii au kutumia dawa ya kuua wadudu(pesticide). Tafadhali wasiliana na afisa wako wa kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi

symptoms.text: splitting of potato tuber while growing
kugawanyika kwa viazi (zao) wakati inakua

response.text: It is likely that your potatoes may be affected by growth cracks. To control growth cracks, ensure uniform plant spacing and adequate soil mositure. You should also avoid excesive and late application of nitrogen and use fertilzers rich in calcium. Please contact your agrovet for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop yako yameathiriwa na kupasuka kwa viazi . Kudhibiti kupasuka kwa viazi, hakikisha upanaji wa nafasi ya kupanda mimea na unyevu wa kutosha wa mchanga. Unapaswa pia kuzuia matumizi ya nitrojeni kwa kuchelewa na kiwango cha juu na utumie mbolea zilizo na kalsiamu.Tafadhali wasiliana na duka la dawa na pembejeo za kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi

confirmation.text: Do you see cracks on the tuber?
Je,unaona mpasuko kwenye viazi?

treatment: Deep ploughing helps in reducing nematode population. Follow crop rotation with nematode antagonistic plants. Grow resistant varieties. In severely infected field follow soil fumigation with suitable nematicide.

response.text: It is likely that your maize may be affected by wireworms. Deep ploughing helps in reducing nematode population. Follow crop rotation with nematode antagonistic plants. Grow resistant varieties. In severely infected field follow soil fumigation with suitable nematicide. Please contact your nearest agricultural extension officer for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop yako yameathiriwa na viwavi vya mchanga (wire worm). Ili kuzuia wadudu hawa,unaweza kutumia mbegu zilizotibiwa tayari kwa kupanda.Tafadhali wasiliana na afisa wako wa kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi

kiwavi kwenye mizizi,mbegu kukulwa na kiwavi

symptoms.text: stem of potato plants appear stunted and pale green or yellow
shina la mimea ya viazi huonekana kudhoofika na kuwa na rangi ya kijani kibichi au manjano

response.text: It is likely that your potatoes may be affected by potato blackleg. To control potato blackleg, remove and destroy (bury or burn) all infected plants as soon as symptoms are noticed and before the disease has time to spread. Please contact your agrovet for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop yako yameathiriwa na ugonjwa wa bakteria wa potato blackleg . Kudhibiti ugonjwa wa potato blackleg, toa na uharibu (kuzika au kuchoma) mimea yote iliyoambukizwa mara tu dalili zinapogunduliwa na kabla ya ugonjwa kuwa na wakati wa kuenea.Tafadhali wasiliana na duka la dawa na pembejeo za kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi

confirmation.text: Do the base (ground level) of the affected stems appear black and rotten?
Je,kwenye msingi (kiwango cha chini karibu na ardhi) cha shina zilizoathiriwa zinaonekana nyeusi na kuoza?

symptoms.text: blackening of the tuber at the center
kuwepo na rangi nyeusi katikakati na ndani ya viazi

response.text: It is likely that your potatoes may be affected by black heart. To control black heart, ensure that you prepare the soil to allow prpoer air circulation.You should also avoid harvesting in extreme heat (around 30°C) or excessively low temperatures (around 0°C) and maintain adequate ventilation during transport and storage. Please contact your agrovet for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba $crop yako yameathiriwa na black heart . Kudhibiti black heart, hakikisha kuwa unatayarisha udongo kuruhusu hewa kutambaa inavyofaa.Unafaa pia kuzuia kuvuna kwa joto kali (karibu 30 ° C) au joto la chini sana (karibu 0 ° C) na kudumisha uingizaji hewa wa kutosha wakati wa kusafirisha na kuhifadhi.Tafadhali wasiliana na duka la dawa au agrovet iliyo karibu nawe  kwa maelezo zaidi

confirmation.text: Do you see the tuber appearing healthy but has a black colouration at the centre?
Je, unaona viazi ikionekana yenye afya lakini ina rangi nyeusi katikati ikikatwa?

symptoms.text: yellowing and stunting of plants
mmea kugeuka rangi ya njano na kudhoofika

response.text: It is likely that your potatoes may be affected by bacterial wilt. To control bacterial wilt, Uproot all infected plants and tubers, with the surrounding soil, and put them in a 2- feet deep pit and cover with clean soil, or burn them. Please contact your agrovet for further clarification.

Kuna uwezekano kwamba potatoes wako umeathiriwa na ugonjwa wa bakteria wa bacterial wilt . Kudhibiti ugonjwa wa bacterial wilt, Pandua au ng'oa mimea na zao yote yaliyoambukizwa, na mchanga unaozunguka, na uweke kwenye shimo lenye urefu wa mita 2 na funika na mchanga safi, au uchome.Tafadhali wasiliana na duka la dawa na pembejeo za kilimo aliye karibu kwa maelezo zaidi

confirmation.text: Do you see sudden wilting and dying of plants in the field even during wet periods?
Je, unaona mimea shambani kudhoofika na kukufa kwa ghfla hata wakati wa mvua?

text: Potato requires wet climatic conditions and slightly acidic soils
The main potato growing counties being Nyandarua, Bomet, Meru, Nakuru, Uasin Gishu, Narok, Nyeri, Kiambu, West Pokot, and Keiyo Marakwett
Viazi inahitaji hali ya hewa ya unyevunyevu na mchanga mdogo wa asidi
Wilaya kubwa zinazokuza viazi ni Nyandarua, Bomet, Meru, Nakuru, Uasin Gishu, Narok, Nyeri, Kiambu, Pokot Magharibi, na Keiyo Marakwett
There are 19 adapted potato varieties in Kenya with Shangi variety being the most common and highly consumed variety due to its early maturity and high productivity
Seeds should be obtained from recommended research stations and producers such as KALRO, KISIMA
Kuna aina 19 za viazi zilizobadilishwa nchini Kenya na aina Shangi kuwa ya kawaida na inayotumiwa sana kutokana na ukomavu wake wa mapema na uzalishaji mkubwa
Mbegu zinapaswa kupatikana kutoka kwa vituo vya utafiti vilivyopendekezwa na wazalishaji kama KALRO, KISIMA
Growing areas should have rainfall of between 850m-1200mm and altitudes of between 1400m-3000m

climate.text: Maeneo yakupanda yanapaswa kuwa na mvua kati ya 850m-1200mm na mwinuko wa kati ya 1400m-3000m

text: Potatoes should be grown on land where solanaceous crops have not been in the previous season to avoid affecting the current season with pests and diseases
Viazi zinapaswa kupandwa kwenye ardhi ambayo mazao ya solanaceous hayakuwa katika msimu uliopita ili kuathiri msimu wa sasa na wadudu na magonjwa.
Make sure the field is free from clods and hard pans to have good tilt which will help with tuber development and air circulation.
Plough the land 20cm deep and break clods to obtain fine, firm and weed-free field before the onset of the rains.
Hakikisha shamba haina kutoka kwa clods na vipande ngumu ili kuwa na tilt nzuri ambayo itasaidia na maendeleo ya mizizi na mzunguko wa hewa.
Panda ardhi kwa kina 20cm na uvunje clods ili upate shamba laini, lenye magugu na magugu kabla ya mvua kunyesha.
To destroy all weeds before planting, farmers should apply a non-selective and pre-emergence herbicide such as PANGA 300mls/20L
Apply LINAGAN 100g/20L after final ridging before emergence to control both broad and grass leaved weeds.
Kindly note that all herbicide application requires the soil to be moist.
Kuuwa magugu yote kabla ya kupanda, wakulima wanapaswa kutumia dawa ya magugu isiyo na kuchagua na kabla ya kutokea kama PANGA 300mls/20L.
Tumia LINAGAN 100g/20L baada ya matuta ya mwisho kabla ya kuibuka kudhibiti magugu yote mabichi na ya majani.
Tafadhali kumbuka kuwa matumizi yote ya dawa ya magugu yanahitaji mchanga kuwa na unyevu.
To break seed dormancy and promote new shoots use Tivag 10mls/20L on tubers.
Ili kuvunja mabweni ya mbegu na kukuza shina mpya tumia Tivag 10mls/20L kwa zao.
Planting should be done at the start of the rains to maximize water utilization
Kupanda kunapaswa kufanywa mwanzoni mwa mvua ili kuongeza matumizi ya maji.
During planting, use Rootcap 2g/plant to protect against nematodes and soil-borne pests such as chaffer grubs, millipedes, and wireworms.
Wakati wa kupanda, tumia Rootcap 2g / mmea kulinda dhidi ya nematode na wadudu unaotokana na udongo kama vile chaffer grubs, millipedes, na wireworms.
Potatoes should be planted in rows at about 30cm apart and at a depth of 10cm
Plant the seed tubers in furrows at a spacing of 60 cm between rows.
Viazi zinapaswa kupandwa kwa safu kwa karibu 30cm na kwa kina cha 10cm.
Panda mizizi ya mbegu kwenye mitaro katika nafasi ya cm 60 kati ya safu

Use Agromaster and Calciprill 110. Agromaster fertilizer that combines control release technology with a specially formulated NPK granule providing nitrogen control & high-quality nutrients uniformly. Calciprill 110 is a high reactive lime which bring rapid correction of soil acidity.
During planting apply Agromaster 16:10:22 200kg/Acre + Calciprill 110 (in acidic soils) 50kgs/Acre.

Tumia Agromaster na Calciprill 110. Mbolea ya Agromaster ambayo inachanganya teknolojia ya kutolewa kutolewa na granule iliyotengenezwa maalum ya NPK kutoa udhibiti wa nitrojeni na virutubishi vya ubora wa hali ya juu. Calciprill 110 ni chokaa cha juu zaidi ambacho huleta marekebisho ya haraka ya acidity ya mchanga.
Wakati wa kupanda tuma Agromaster 16:10:22 200kg / Acre + Kalciprill 110 (katika mchanga wa asidi) 50kgs / Acre.
Earthing up the soil around the plants should be done once the leaves start to push themselves above the soil, to prevent the potatoes from showing.
Kuweka mchanga juu kando ya mimea inapaswa kufanywa mara tu majani yanapoanza kujisukuma juu ya mchanga, kuzuia viazi visionyeshe
The best method to control weeds in potatoes is by use of herbicides.

Apply the following herbicides to control weeds; LINAGAN 100g/20L (after final ridging before emergence to control grass weeds) and AGIL 100mls/20L (applied at sprouting after emergence and at vegetative stage to kill grass).
Ensure that there is active vegetative growth of the weeds when applying post-emergence herbicides.
Avoid manual weeding as this will injure the plant and expose it to diseases
Njia bora ya kudhibiti magugu katika viazi ni kwa kutumia dawa ya magugu.

Tumia mimea ya mimea yafuatayo kudhibiti magugu; LINAGAN 100g/20L (baada ya matuta ya mwisho kabla ya kuibuka kudhibiti magugu ya nyasi) na AGIL 100mls/20L (inatumika kwenye kuchipua baada ya kuibuka na kwa mimea kuua nyasi)
Hakikisha kuwa ukuaji wa mimea unakua wakati wa kutumia dawa ya magugu ya baada ya kuibuka.
Epuka kupalilia kwa mwongozo kwani hii itaumiza mmea na kuainisha magonjwa
Earthing up the soil around the plants should be done once the leaves start to push themselves above the soil, to prevent the potatoes from showing.
Ridging done during second weeding to prevent greening of exposed tubers, attack by tuber moth and internal brown spot from high soil temperatures
Ridging/earthing up should be done along the rows as the potato grows and the final ridge should be 25cm high.
Kuweka mchanga juu kando ya mimea inapaswa kufanywa mara tu majani yanapoanza kujisukuma juu ya mchanga, kuzuia viazi visionyeshe.
Mzunguko unafanywa wakati wa magugu ya pili kuzuia kuzuia kuongezeka kwa mizizi ya wazi, kushambuliwa na nondo ya mizizi na doa la kahawia la ndani kutokana na joto kubwa la mchanga
Kupanda / kuweka juu inapaswa kufanywa kando ya safu viazi ikiendelea kukua na safu ya mlima ya mwisho inapaswa kuwa 25cm juu
Important to prevent spread of soil borne diseases and pests and must be done with crops outside the same family as potatoes.
Crop rotation also helps improve soil fertility, water retention and management of weeds.
Ni muhimu kuzuia kuenea kwa magonjwa yanayouzwa na wadudu wa ardhini na lazima ifanyike na mazao nje ya familia moja na viazi.
Mzunguko wa mazao pia husaidia kuboresha rutuba ya mchanga, utunzaji wa maji na usimamizi wa magugu.
During planting apply Agromaster 16:10:22 200kg/Acre + Calciprill 110 (in acidic soils) 50kgs/Acre.
3rd Week apply Polyfeed (19:19:19) at 100g/20L
5th Week apply Super Nitro Humix at 50mls/20L
6th Week apply Agriphite 100mls/20L.
9th Week and 10th Week Growcal Mgb 50mls/20L.
Wakati wa kupanda tuma Agromaster 16:10:22 200kg / Acre + Kalciprill 110 (katika mchanga wa asidi) 50kgs / Acre.
Wiki ya tatu inatumika Polyfeed (19: 19) kwa 100g / 20L.
Wiki ya 5 kutumika Super Nitro Humix kwa 50mls/20L.
Wiki ya 6 inatumika kwa Agriphite 100mls/20L.
Wiki ya 9 na Wiki ya 10 inatumika Growcal Mgb 50mls/20L.
Maturity and readiness for harvest is determined when leaves begin to turn yellow and a few plants taken and checked for tuber size.
Potatoes are harvested when the plants start to die back.
Harvesting should start 10-15 days after dehaulming, and the entire crop should be removed from the field to avoid harboring pests and diseases.
Ukomavu na utayari wa mavuno imedhamiriwa wakati majani yanaanza kugeuka manjano na mimea michache iliyochukuliwa na kukaguliwa kwa ukubwa wa mizizi.
Viazi huvunwa wakati mimea inapoanza kukufa
Uvunaji unapaswa kuanza siku 10-15 baada ya kudorora, na mazao yote yanapaswa kutolewa kwenye shamba ili kuzuia wadudu na magonjwa.
Dehaulming is cutting of the aerial parts of the potato plant at about 80-90 days when they start turning yellow.
Dehaulming is done to harden the potato tubers improving durability.
Dehaulming ni kukata sehemu za angani za mmea wa viazi wakati wa siku 80-90 wakati zinaanza kugeuka njano.
Dehaulming inafanywa kwa ugumu mizizi ya viazi kuboresha uimara.
In-case the farmers plans to store them for long, hardening off should be done, and this is by waiting for another 2-3 weeks after dying back.
Iwapo wakulima wanapanga kuzihifadhi kwa muda mrefu, ugumu unapaswa kufanywa, na hii ni kwa kusubiri kwa wiki nyingine 2-3 baada ya kukufa.
Harvested tubers should be dried quickly to remove surface moisture. They should also be dried in storage sheds to avoid greening.
The harvested tubers should be sheltered from rain and water run-off.
Viazi iliyovunwa inapaswa kukaushwa haraka ili kuondoa unyevu wa uso. Inapaswa pia kukaushwa kwenye shehia za kuhifadhia kuzuia kijani kibichi.
Viazi iliyovunwa inapaswa kulindwa kutokana na mvua na maji yaweze kuzima.
Good and bad tubers must be separated to avoid spreading of diseases to rest of good tubers.
viazi nzuri na mbaya lazima itenganishwe ili kuzuia kuenea kwa magonjwa kupumzika kwa mizizi nzuri
Potatoes should be spread out to allow air circulation and stored in a cool dry place with temperature of 7 degrees -10 degrees Celsius
Viazi zinapaswa kusambazwa ili kuruhusu mzunguko wa hewa na kuhifadhiwa mahali pa baridi paka na joto la nyuzi 7-digrii Celsius.
plant show black/ brown lesions on leaves and stem and look like are burnt.
Mmea huonyesha vidonda vyeusi / hudhurungi kwenye majani na shina na inaonekana kama imechomwa.
Spraying with fungicides such as Metacop 40g/20L or Amimax 50g/20L and using clean seeds.
Nyunyizia mimea na fungicides kama Metacop 40g / 20L au Amimax 50g / 20L na kutumia mbegu safi.
More severe towards the end of growing season with plant showing dark brown spots with concentric yellow rings on the older leaves
Mbaya zaidi hadi mwisho wa msimu wa kupanda na mmea unaonyesha matangazo ya hudhurungi yenye pete za manjano zilizo kwenye majani ya mzee
Spraying with fungicides such as Metacop 40g/20L or Amimax 50g/20L and using clean seeds.
Nyunyizia mimea na fungicides kama Metacop 40g / 20L au Amimax 50g / 20L na kutumia mbegu safi.
It is the most damaging pest attacking potatoes in the field and in storage in warm, dry areas by boring through stems, mine and bore leaves as well as tubers
Larva burrows through tubers leaving tunnels with excreta exposing the tubers to fungal and bacterial infection leading to rotting
Ni wadudu wanaohanga sana kushambulia viazi shambani na kwenye maeneo yenye joto na kavu kwa kuchoma kupitia shina, mgodi na majani ya kuzaa na mizizi.
Mabuu ya mabuu kupitia mizizi huacha vichungi kwa kuweka nje mizizi kwa maambukizi ya vimelea na bakteria na kusababisha kuoza
In the field, eliminate volunteer potato plants and reject any seed lot from infested fields/stores
Use Rootcap 2g/plant during planting and spray Radiant 10mls alternate with Rapid 15mls/20L.
Kwenye shamba, futa mimea ya viazi ya kujitolea na ukata mbegu yoyote kutoka kwa shamba / duka zilizohifadhiwa
Tumia Rootcap 2g / mmea wakati wa kupanda na nyunyizia Radiant 10mls mbadala na Rapid 15mls / 20L.
Bacterial disease that causes wilting, yellowing and stunting of plants even when the weather is wet.
Ugonjwa wa bakteria ambao husababisha kutafuna, kuota na kudumaa kwa mimea hata wakati hali ya hewa ni mvua.
Proper soil analysis should be done before planting and regular inspection of crop removing any affected crops
Ensuring that only certified seeds are used, rotation is done with non-solanaceous crop family, Drench Metacop or Funguran 50g/20L to suppress the infection.
Control of weed hosts such as night shade, thorn apple
Uchanganuzi sahihi wa mchanga unapaswa kufanywa kabla ya kupanda na ukaguzi wa mara kwa mara wa mazao ya kuondoa mazao yoyote yaliyoathirika
Kuhakikisha kuwa mbegu zilizothibitishwa hutumiwa tu, mzunguko hufanywa na familia ya mazao ambayo sio solanaceous, Drench Metacop au Funguran 50g / 20L kukandamiza maambukizi.
Udhibiti wa majeshi ya magugu kama vile kivuli cha usiku, apple ya miiba
Bacterial infection that causes tubers to rot in the ground and in storage.
Slimy, wet, black rot lesions spreading from the rotting mother tuber up the stems, especially under wet conditions.
Mature crop shows black discoloration of previously healthy stems, accompanied by a rapid wilting and sometimes yellowing of the leaves.
Maambukizi ya bakteria ambayo husababisha mizizi kuota ardhini na kwenye kuhifadhi.
Vidonda nyembamba, vilivyo na mvua nyeusi vilivyoenea kutoka kwa mama anayezunguka huzunguka mashina, haswa chini ya hali ya mvua.
Mimea iliyokomaa inaonyesha rangi nyeusi ya shina za zamani zilizo na afya, ikiambatana na kukata haraka na wakati mwingine majani ya njano.
Spray Metacop 50g/20L to suppress disease. Remove and destroy all infected plants as soon as symptoms are noticed and before the disease spread.
The disease thrives in warm, damp conditions so improve poorly drained sites and try to lift crops during dry weather.
Crop rotation and use of clean resistant seeds.
nyunyiza Metacop 50g / 20L kukandamiza ugonjwa. Ondoa na uharibu mimea yote iliyoambukizwa mara tu dalili zinapogunduliwa na kabla ya ugonjwa kuenea.
Ugonjwa unakua katika hali ya joto, unyevunyevu hivyo huboresha maeneo haswa ya maji na jaribu kuinua mazao wakati wa hali ya hewa kavu.
Mzunguko wa mazao na utumiaji wa mbegu sugu safi.
The yellowing in nitrogen deficiency is uniform over the entire leaf including the veins.
Recovery of deficient plants to applied nitrogen is immediate (days) and spectacular.
Younger leaves turn darker green, older leaves remain yellow. Upward cupping of deficient leaves when severe.
Njano katika upungufu wa nitrojeni ni sawa juu ya jani lote ikijumuisha mishipa.
Kupona upya kwa mimea yenye upungufu wa madini ya nitrojeni ni haraka (siku) na ya kushangaza.
Majani madogo yanageuka kijani kibichi, majani mzee hubaki manjano. Kupanda vikombe zaidi vya majani yenye upungufu wakati ni kali.
Apply Agromaster 16:10:16 75kgs/acre during planting; spray Super Nitro Humix 50mls/20L on growing crops.
weka Agromaster 16:10:16 75kgs / ekari wakati wa kupanda; nyunyiza Super Nitro Humix 50mls / 20L kwenye mazao yanayokua.
First develop on older leaves showing some necrotic spots and plants are dwarfed or stunted.
Phosphorus deficient plants develop very slowly with a distinct purpling of the stem, petiole and the under sides of the leaves.
Plant remains stunted, darker than normal color. Lower leaf surface gray-green and leaflets roll upward in severe cases.
Anza kwanza kwenye majani mzee yanayoonyesha sehemu zingine za mimea na mimea ni ndogo au iliyoshonwa.
Mimea yenye upungufu wa phosphorus hua polepole sana na kusudi tofauti ya shina, petiole na chini ya majani.
Mmea unabaki kuwa na mshangao, mweusi kuliko rangi ya kawaida. Sehemu ya chini ya kijani-kijani na vijikaratasi huendelea juu katika hali mbaya.
At planting use Agromaster 15:24:10 or Spray polyfeed 15:30:15 100g/20L.
Katika upandaji tumia Agromaster 15:24:10 au weka polyfeed 15:30:15 100g / 20L.
Leaves show a general overall chlorosis. The veins and petioles show a very distinct reddish color.
The yellowing is much more uniform over the entire plant including young leaves.
The reddish color often found on the underside of the leaves.
Majani yanaonyesha chlorosis ya jumla ya jumla. Mishipa na petioles zinaonyesha rangi nyekundu sana..
Njano ni sawa zaidi juu ya mmea mzima ikiwa ni pamoja na majani ya majani
Rangi nyekundu mara nyingi hupatikana kwenye undani wa majani.
At planting use Calciprill S14 50kgs/Acre.
Wakati wa kupanda tumia Calciprill S14 50kgs / Acre
The calcium-deficient leaves show necrosis around the base of the leaves.
Symptoms show soft dead necrotic tissue at rapidly growing areas.
This ultimately results in the margins of the leaves growing more slowly than the rest of the leaf causing the leaf to cup downward.
Majani yasiyokuwa na kalisi yanaonyesha necrosis karibu na msingi wa majani.
Dalili zinaonyesha tishu laini za necrotic zilizokufa katika maeneo yanayokua haraka.
Mwishowe hii husababisha pembezoni za majani hukua polepole zaidi kuliko jani lililosababisha jani kuota chini.
Spray Growcal Mgb 50mls/20L or Introgel Calcium 50mls/20L.
Kunyunyizia Growcal Mgb 50mls / 20L au Introgel Calcium 50mls / 20L..
Symptoms begin with yellowing in intercostal areas at the base of leaflets or leaf margin.
The chlorosis expands to the whole leaf as the deficiency continues. The margin often remains green.

Eventually necrotic patches appear in the yellow areas which terminate as intercostal leaf scorch. In severe cases the oldest leaves most affected, which have green veins and large areas of marginal and intercostal necrosis.
Dalili zinaanza na njano katika maeneo ya ndani kwa msingi wa vipeperushi au pembe ya jani.
Chlorosis huenea hadi kwenye jani lote upungufu unapoendelea. Majini mara nyingi hubakia kijani.

Mwishowe patches zilizoonekana huonekana kwenye maeneo ya manjano ambayo husitisha kama harufu ya majani ya ndani. Katika hali mbaya majani kongwe huathiriwa zaidi, ambayo yana mishipa ya kijani na maeneo makubwa ya necrosis ya kando na ya ndani.
Use Growcal Mgb 50mls/20L or use Magprill 50kgs/Acre during planting.
Tumia Growcal Mgb 50mls / 20L au tumia Magprill 50kgs / Acre wakati wa kupanda.
You can apply Growcal Mgb at the rate of 50mls/20L. Packs 250mls, 500mls and 1 Litre..
Unaweza kutumia Growcal Mgb kwa kiwango cha 50mls/20L. mifuko 250mls, 500mls and 1 Litre.
Growcal Mgb is a special suspension concentrate containing Calcium, Nitrogen, Magnesium and Boron.
Bidhaa ya Growcal Mgb ni bidhaa maalum ya lishe inayo Kalsiamu, Nitrojeni, Magnesiamu na Boroni.
information.description: muundo wa kemikali wa Growcal Mgb

text: Panga SL can be applied in spray volumes ranging from 12 to 600 litres per hectare $crop.
Unaweza kutumia Panga SL kwa kunyunyiza:kutoka 12 hadi 600 lita /ha kwenye  $crop yako

Panga SL is a special herbicide product containing 360g/l- glyphosate/glifosaat(glisien) and (glyphosate isopropylamine salt / glifosaat isopropielamiensout) -480 g/l used during pre-emergence stage of vigorously growing weeds.
Bidhaa ya Panga SL bidhaa maalum ya lishe inayo 360g/l- glyphosate/glifosaat(glisien) and (glyphosate isopropylamine salt / glifosaat inayotumiwa baada ya magugu kutokea .
information.description: muundo wa kemikali wa Panga SL

text: Preferably apply LINAGAN 50 WP as a pre-emergence,spray evenly over a moist and well-prepared seedbed.
Unaweza kutumia $product kwa njia ya unyunyuziaji kwa kunyunyiziakwenye shanba lililopandwa lenye unyevu na lililotengenezwa vizuri kabla ya mimie kuota.
LINAGAN 50 WP is a selective pre and post-emergence herbicide that is foilar absorbed and residual herbicide.
LINAGAN 50 WP ni kichunguzi gugu kinacho tumika kabla na baada ya kuota kwa mimie hufyonza kwa majani na mabaki yake huua gugu.
information.description: muundo wa kemikali wa LINAGAN 50 WP

text: You can apply ROOTCAP at the rate of 2g/plant. Available packs 250g, 500g and 1 Litre.
Unaweza kutumia ROOTCAP kwa kiwango cha 2g/plant. inapatikana katika mifuko ya 250g, 500g and 1 Litre.
: A contact nematicide granules applied during planting to control all types of nematodes and soil-borne pests including chaffer grubs, millipedes, wireworms and centipedes.
Chunusi za nematicide za mawasiliano zinazotumika wakati wa kupanda kudhibiti aina zote za nematode na wadudu unaotokana na udongo pamoja na zabibu wa manjano, mirungi, waya na mierezi.
You can apply AVIRMEC at the rate of 10ml/20L. Packs 50mls, 100mls, 250mls and 1 Litre.
Unaweza kutumia AVIRMEC kwa  kiwango cha Rates of 10ml/20L. pakiti 50mls, 100mls, 250mls and 1 Litre.
AVIRMEC is an insecticide and acaricide for control of motile stages of spidermites leaf miner.
AVIRMEC ni dawa ya wadudu na ekari kwa udhibiti wa hatua za mwendo wa mgongo wa majani wa spidermites
You can apply LEVO 2.4 SL  at the rate of 20-30ml/100lts.
Unaweza kutumia LEVO 2.4 SL kwa  kiwango cha 20-30ml/100lts
LEVO 2.4 SL is a broad spectrum Biological insecticide(6 sprays) for use against a wide spectrum of Pests. containing Prosuler Oxymatrine 2.5% .
LEVO 2.4 SL ni dawa mpana wa kibaolojia (vijiko 6) ya wadudu kwa matumizi dhidi ya wadudu wengi. Iliyo na  Prosuler Oxymatrine 2.5% na inatumika kwa kiwango cha 30ml / 100lts au 0.5L / Ha.
information.description: muundo wa kemikali wa LEVO 2.4 SL

text: You can apply VICTORY at the rate of 2.5kg/Ha. Packs 50g, 100g, 500g and 1 kg
Unaweza kutumia VICTORY kwa  kiwango cha 2.5kg / Ha. Pakiti 50g, 100g, 500g and 1 kg
VICTORY is a broad spectrum systemic preventive & curative fungicide effective for controlling early and late blights and downy mildew.
VICTORY ni aina maalum ya dawa yenye wigo utaratibu wa kuzuia & tiba ya kuua yenye ufanisi kwa kudhibiti blights mapema na marehemu na koga ya chini
Apply POLYFEED (19:19:19) at the rate of 100g/20L. Available packs: 500g, 1Kg and 25Kg.
Tumia POLYFEED (19: 19) kwa kiwango cha 100g / 20L. Pakiti zinazopatikana: 500g, 1Kg na 25Kg.
POLYFEED (19:19:19) is a water soluble balanced NPK fertilizer for correcting NPK deficiencies
POLYFEED (19: 19) ni mbolea ya maji ya NPK yenye unyevu kwa kurekebisha upungufu wa NPK.
Apply Agromaster 16:10:22 at the rate of 1200kgs/Acre. Available packs 25kg bags.
Tumia Agromaster 16:10:22 kwa kiwango cha 1200kgs/Acre. Pakiti zinazopatikana ni 25kg
Agromaster 16:10:22 is a controlled release fertilizer with balanced nutrition which increase yields due to high nutrients use efficiency.
Agromaster 16:10:22 ni mbolea ya kutolewa iliyodhibitiwa na lishe bora ambayo huongeza mavuno kutokana na ufanisi mkubwa wa matumizi ya virutubishi.
Apply Calciprill 110 at the banding rates of 50kgs/Acre to increase soil Ph by 0.3 – 0.5.
Tumia Calciprill 110 kwa viwango vya banding ya 50kgs / ekari ili kuongeza mchanga wa Ph kwa 0.3 - 0.5
Calciprill 110 is a quick reactive limestone to correct soil acidity.
Calciprill 110 ni chokaa haraka tendaji kurekebisha asidi ya udongo
Apply Nissorun at the rate of 10mls.Pack sizes: 1 Litre.
Tumia Nissorun kwa kiwango cha 10mls.Pakiti inayopatikana: 1 Litre.
Nissorun is a highly Effective miticide for the control of immature mite stages.
Nissorun ni njia bora ya kuzuia mauaji kwa udhibiti wa hatua za mite wa mchanga.
Apply Metacop at the rate of 50g/20L. Packs 500g and 1 kg
Tumia Metacop kwa kiwango cha ya 50g/20L. Pakiti inayopatikana: 500g and 1 kg
Metacop is a multi-site fungicide with Preventive and curative properties against fungal and bacterials specs.  Metacop controls downy mildew, early and late blight.
Metacop ni fungungi ya tovuti nyingi yenye mali ya Kuzuia na ya uponyaji dhidi ya spishi za vimelea na bakteria. Metacop inadhibiti koga kali, mapema na kuchelewa kuumiza.
Apply Amimax at the rate of 40g/20L. Packs 120g, 250g, 500g and 1Kg.
Tumia Amimax kwa kiwango cha ya 40g/20L. Pakiti inayopatikana: 120g, 250g, 500g na 1Kg
Amimax is a fungicide for the control of early, late blight and downy mildew.
Amimax ni fangasi kwa ajili ya udhibiti wa konda wa mapema, kali na wa chini
Apply Rapid is available in 100mls and 500mls packs.
Tumia Rapid inapatikana kwa pakiti za 100mls na 500mls
Rapid is an effective product for the control of chewing and sucking pests. Rapid controls caterpillars, spidermites, thrips, Potato tuber moths, whiteflies and aphids.
Rapid ni bidhaa inayofaa kwa udhibiti wa wadudu wa kutafuna na kunyonya. Udhibiti wa haraka wa viwavi, spidermites, thrips, nondo za mizizi ya viazi, ngozi nyeupe na aphids.
Apply Radiant at the rate of 10mls/20L. Available packs 50mls, 100mls, 250mls and 1L.
Tumia Radiant kwa kiwango cha ya 10mls/20L. Pakiti inayopatikana: 50mls, 100mls, 250mls na 1L
Radiant is unique chemistry for the control of thrips, caterpillars and potato tuber moths. This is an ideal product for resistance management.
Radiant ni kemia ya kipekee kwa udhibiti wa miiba, viwavi na nondo za viazi vya viazi. Hii ni bidhaa bora kwa usimamizi wa upinzani.
Apply Tivag at the rate of 10mls/20L. Available packs 50mls, 100mls and 1L.
Tumia Tivag kwa kiwango cha ya 10mls/20L. Pakiti inayopatikana: 50mls, 100mls na 1L
Tivag is registered and commercially available gibberellic acid for use in potatoes seeds to break seed dormancy and promote sprouting.
Tivag imesajiliwa na inapatikana katika biashara ya asidi ya gibberellic kwa matumizi ya mbegu za viazi kuvunja ukamilifu wa mbegu na kukuza kumea.
Apply Agriphite 600 at the rate of 50mls/20L. Packs 500mls and 1L.
Tumia Agriphite 600 kwa kiwango cha ya 50mls/20L. Pakiti inayopatikana: 500mls na 1L
Agriphite 600 is made up of phosphite-based products which boosts plant immune system against diseases such as downy mildew. In addition Agriphite 600 supplies Potassium and Phosphorus.
Agriphite 600 imeundwa na bidhaa za msingi wa phosphite ambazo huongeza kinga ya mmea dhidi ya magonjwa kama vile hlobo la downy. Kwa kuongeza Agriphite 600 inasambaza Potasiamu na Fosforasi
